mutants.code:
def alternateSort(arr):
    arr.sort()
    i = 1
    j = len(arr) - 1
    result = []
    flag = True
    while i < j:
        if flag is True:
            result.append(arr[i])
            i += 1
            flag = False
        else:
            result.append(arr[j])
            j -= 1
            flag = True
    result.append(arr[i])
    return result
